name: Pius Wanjiru
bio: He is a fouth year IT student in MMUST, with a bias in web programming.He also like watching fiction series

name: Linus Tolvalds
bio: Linus Benedict Torvalds is a Finnish-American software engineer who is the creator and, for a long time, principal developer, of the Linux kernel, which became the kernel for operating systems such as GNU and years later Android and Chrome OS.

name: Mike Bostock
bio: Michael 'Mike' Bostock is an American computer scientist and data-visualisation specialist. He is noted as one of the key developers of D3.js, a JavaScript library used for producing dynamic, interactive, online data visualizations.

name: Jim Parsons
reknown: Main Actor in The Big Bang Theory
bio: James Joseph 'Jim' Parsons is an American actor. He is known for playing Sheldon Cooper in the CBS sitcom The Big Bang Theory.

name: Stephen Hawkings
reknown: Physist, cosmetologist-come up with the big bang theory
bio: He come up with the Big Bang Theory

name: Terrence Tao
reknown: Started Teaching mathematics at the age of two
bio: He started teaching mathematics at the age of two and went to teach physics in campus when he was very young,he has also worked for NASA
